verses.text: “\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w build|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w acacia|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*. \w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* must \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w square|strong="H7251"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* long, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*.\f + \fr 27:1 \ft The altar was approximately 7.5 feet in length and width, and 4.5 feet high (2.3 meters in length and width, and 1.4 meters high).\f*

\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* each \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* four \w corners|strong="H6438"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* piece, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w utensils|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*—\w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w pots|strong="H5518"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w removing|strong="H1878"\w* \w ashes|strong="H1878"\w*, \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w shovels|strong="H3257"\w*, \w its|strong="H3605"\w* sprinkling \w bowls|strong="H4219"\w*, \w its|strong="H3605"\w* meat \w forks|strong="H4207"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w firepans|strong="H4289"\w*.

\w Construct|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grate|strong="H4345"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* mesh, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* each \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* four \w corners|strong="H7098"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mesh.

\w Set|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* grate \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w ledge|strong="H3749"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* mesh \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* \w halfway|strong="H2677"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

Additionally, \w make|strong="H6213"\w* poles \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w acacia|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* poles \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* inserted \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* poles \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sides|strong="H6763"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Construct|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* altar \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w boards|strong="H3871"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w hollow|strong="H5014"\w*. \w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H2022"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w were|strong="H2022"\w* \w shown|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*. The Courtyard (Exodus 38:9–20)

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*. \w On|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H5045"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* curtains \w of|strong="H5045"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* cubits long \f + \fr 27:9 \ft 100 cubits is approximately 150 feet or 45.7 meters; also in verse 11.\f* \w on|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*,

\w with|strong="H6242"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w posts|strong="H5982"\w* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* bases, \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w bands|strong="H2838"\w* \w on|strong="H5982"\w* the \w posts|strong="H5982"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="H3651"\w* there \w are|strong="H7050"\w* \w to|strong="H6242"\w* \w be|strong="H3701"\w* curtains \w on|strong="H6285"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* cubits long, \w with|strong="H3651"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w posts|strong="H5982"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* bases, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w bands|strong="H2838"\w* \w on|strong="H6285"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w posts|strong="H5982"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6285"\w* curtains \w on|strong="H6285"\w* \w the|strong="H6285"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w the|strong="H6285"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w shall|strong="H6285"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* cubits \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*,\f + \fr 27:12 \ft 50 cubits is approximately 75 feet or 22.9 meters; also in verse 13.\f* \w with|strong="H3220"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w posts|strong="H5982"\w* \w and|strong="H2572"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* bases.

\w The|strong="H6924"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w the|strong="H6924"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w*, toward \w the|strong="H6924"\w* \w sunrise|strong="H4217"\w*, \w is|strong="H2691"\w* \w to|strong="H4217"\w* be \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* cubits \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*.

Make \w the|strong="H6240"\w* curtains \w on|strong="H7969"\w* \w one|strong="H7050"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* long,\f + \fr 27:14 \ft 15 cubits is approximately 22.5 feet or 6.9 meters; also in verse 15.\f* \w with|strong="H5982"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w posts|strong="H5982"\w* \w and|strong="H2568"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* bases,

\w and|strong="H2568"\w* \w the|strong="H8145"\w* curtains \w on|strong="H7969"\w* \w the|strong="H8145"\w* \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* long, \w with|strong="H5982"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w posts|strong="H5982"\w* \w and|strong="H2568"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* bases.

\w The|strong="H8179"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H8179"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w shall|strong="H4639"\w* be \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* cubits long,\f + \fr 27:16 \ft 20 cubits is approximately 30 feet or 9.1 meters.\f* \w with|strong="H4639"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curtain|strong="H4539"\w* embroidered \w with|strong="H4639"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*. It \w shall|strong="H4639"\w* \w have|strong="H8179"\w* four \w posts|strong="H5982"\w* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* four bases.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w posts|strong="H5982"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w bands|strong="H2836"\w*, \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* bases.

\w The|strong="H3967"\w* entire \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w shall|strong="H3967"\w* be \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* long \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*,\f + \fr 27:18 \ft The courtyard was approximately 150 feet long and 75 feet wide (45.7 meters long and 22.9 meters wide).\f* \w with|strong="H2691"\w* curtains \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*,\f + \fr 27:18 \ft 5 cubits is approximately 7.5 feet or 2.3 meters.\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w with|strong="H2691"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* bases.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w utensils|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w for|strong="H3627"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w use|strong="H5656"\w*, \w including|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w tent|strong="H3489"\w* \w pegs|strong="H3489"\w* \w and|strong="H5178"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tent|strong="H3489"\w* \w pegs|strong="H3489"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3627"\w* \w be|strong="H5656"\w* \w made|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*. The Oil for the Lamps (Leviticus 24:1–4)

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* pressed \w olives|strong="H2132"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w keep|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* burning \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*,\f + \fr 27:21 \ft The Testimony refers to the stone tablets in the ark of the covenant inscribed with the Ten Commandments.\f* \w Aaron|strong="H6186"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* tend \w the|strong="H6440"\w* lamps \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*. \w This|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w*.
